map.SNACKBARLABEL: GeoLocation deactivated. Please activate it or enter a address in the search field !
map.NOPARCFOUND: No parc found around. Try to search another place or explore the map

parcDetails.INITIALIAZED: This parc has just been imported. You can update it and confirm its existence !
parcDetails.LOWEQUIPMENT: This parc does seem to have a lot of equiment. Don't hesitate to update it!
parcDetails.PLEASELOGIN: Please log in to add reviews
parcDetails.SNACKBARLABELVALIDATED: Thanks for confirming the existence of the parc.
parcDetails.SNACKBARLABELDELETED: Thanks, your request is saved. If 5 users asked for the deletion, the parc will be deleted.

firstVisit.FINDPARCFEATURE1: Geo-locate you and find parcs nearby
firstVisit.FINDPARCFEATURE2: Enter location in the search bar and find parcs there
firstVisit.COMMUNITYFEATURE4: Already imported parcs are from OpenStreetMap.
firstVisit.WELCOME1: Welcome to Mapikid, the application listing all playgrounds for children around you !
firstVisit.WELCOME2: Mapikid is a community for playgrounds. We have collected many playgrounds around the world and you can edit them, add more information and send your reviews
firstVisit.WELCOME3: Don't hesitate to log in with your Google or Facebook account, you will be able to set reviews
firstVisit.FEEDBACKFEATURE1: Please report bugs and comments via the menu section 'Feedback'

feedback.FEEDBACKMODALTITLE: Give your feedback on this application !
feedback.MESSAGELABEL: Enter bugs, comments, positive or negative feedback
